column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The seating was a community one
column3: except I was seated next to someone who was sneezing and blowing his nose extremely loud. It is not Jinya's fault
column4: but no one wants to dine with the sound of nose blowing right next to them. I suggest you guys take notice of health concerns
column5: etc and please skip a seat. I don't mind waiting to avoid that unpleasantry.
